sticky_enabled=”0″]

Transform your wedding dreams into a breathtaking reality with Party Decor Hire. Collaborating closely with our brides, we meticulously tailor each detail to reflect your vision. From intimate gatherings to grand affairs, we’re equipped to handle any scale of decoration, ensuring a magical and unforgettable day. Let us alleviate the pressure by managing delivery and setup, so you can focus on cherishing every moment of your special day.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1NCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Learn More” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#e878e8″ custom_padding=”|100px||100px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We specialize in crafting compelling narratives and unforgettable atmospheres for corporate events. From gala dinners to conferences, we infuse quality and professionalism into every aspect of your function. With our expertise in floral artistry and striking centerpieces, we elevate the ambiance of your event, ensuring it leaves a lasting impression on attendees. Whether it’s a year-end celebration, golf day, special promotion, or conference.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1OSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Learn More” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#e878e8″ custom_padding=”|100px||100px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Party Decor Hire elevate your special events with our creative touch. Whether it’s a casual outdoor gathering, milestone birthday bash, cherished anniversary, or adorable baby shower, we’ve got the expertise to make it memorable. From festive helium balloons to elegant floral centerpieces and charming Stretch tents for outdoor cover, we offer a range of services to ensure your celebration is unforgettable. Enjoy a stress-free party while we handle the details.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE2MyJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Learn More” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#e878e8″ custom_padding=”|100px||100px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Party-Decor-Hire-testimonials.png” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”0px||2px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1300px” custom_padding=”80px||80px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”Alegreya Sans||||||||” background_color=”rgba(245,245,245,0.77)” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”65px||65px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“The team at Party Décor Hire offered me great service, they have exceptional talent and a genuine love for what they do.
They were so helpful in guiding me to achieve the perfect look and feel for my wedding, whilst remaining sensitive to my budget.”

Elevate your event with our expert decor styling services. Our experienced team specializes in creating stunning displays using creative and innovative ideas, coupled with our extensive inventory of hired stock items. Whether you’re planning a wedding, corporate event, or special celebration, trust us to transform your venue into a visually captivating space that leaves a lasting impression on your guests.

Save on expensive florist charges by entrusting Party Decor Hire with all your flower needs. We specialize in creating and delivering bespoke arrangements that perfectly complement your chosen colors and theme. Whether it’s for a wedding, corporate event, or special celebration, our team ensures every bloom aligns harmoniously with your vision, without breaking the bank. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE3NCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Learn More” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#e878e8″ custom_padding=”|100px||100px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_perspective_image src=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/decor-hire-new-font.png” title_text=”decor hire new font” url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE3MCJ9fQ==@” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _dynamic_attributes=”url” _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”zoom” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”105%|105%” sticky_enabled=”0″][/dsm_perspective_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

For all your event hiring needs, trust Party Decor Hire to provide an extensive selection of equipment, from tables and chairs to table linen and decorative accents. Whether it’s a corporate event, wedding, or special function, we’re dedicated to helping you create a memorable and fabulous occasion. No event is too small for us to handle with care and attention to detail. Visit our shop to explore our range firsthand.

Let us alleviate the stress of your event by handling all the setup details. From delivering your requirements to the venue to expertly setting up the decor and creating beautiful centerpieces, our team ensures every aspect of your event is executed with precision and care. Relax and enjoy your special occasion while we take care of the setup, ensuring everything looks stunning and runs smoothly.

Maximize your budget with our candle hire service, offering high-quality candles made in-house at a fraction of the cost of purchasing. Whether you need candles for ambiance at a wedding, corporate event, or special celebration, we have a variety of sizes available to suit your needs. Why spend money on candles that burn away when you can rent ours and enjoy both savings and style?

Transform your venue into a breathtaking masterpiece with our expert draping services. From roof-to-floor draping to elegant bridal table backdrops and ceiling sails, our experienced team will bring your vision to life with precision and style. Whether you’re planning a wedding, corporate event, or special celebration, count on us to create an atmosphere of elegance and sophistication.
